column4: i am installing ubuntu on a guys computer that still needs some help, but i'm gonna be in another location - what is some good 'remote desktop sharing' software where.. i can support his needs and he can watch me do it.. so i can help him learn the applications?  i know teamviewer exists, but i think it sucks i have to get some account on some website to run it
if its not already isntalled, and you're trying to dualinstall, you're kind of out of luck
oh no... i'm sorry - im here installing it, but i'm going to leave in two days
